plot: The ghosts of Francoise and Louis are invoked by accident from beyond by a scam artist called El Ojitos, who, along with El Manitas, attempt to take advantage of the presence of the ghosts in order to marry their girlfriends.
title: Los fantasmas burlones
plot_es: The ghosts of Francoise and Louis are invoked by accident from beyond by a scam artist called El Ojitos, who, along with El Manitas, attempt to take advantage of the presence of the ghosts in order to marry their girlfriends.
plot_en: The ghosts of Francoise and Louis are invoked by accident from beyond by a scam artist called El Ojitos, who, along with El Manitas, attempt to take advantage of the presence of the ghosts in order to marry their girlfriends.
